item.title: Kojima Productions, NEXT
item.dc:creator: John_Killer118
item.description:
I can now at last look forward to a Metal Gear game! My dream has come true!
Too bad it doesn’t star Solid Snake, though since I have a PS1 I could just get the first one from a used game store. Who knows, maybe it’ll inspire me to get a PS3 or at least a PSP Go (provided that “Metal Gear Solid Portable Ops” and “Portable Ops+” can be downloaded since the PSP Go is UMD-less.)

Read full topic

item.title: Kojima Productions, NEXT

item.description:

item.title: Kojima Productions, NEXT
item.dc:creator: Crunchy
item.description:
OldDirtyBastard:

Btw, nothing says that MGS:R is XBox360 exclusive

That’s what I was trying to say. If it was exclusive, you can be sure as hell that Microsoft would have said it was (which they didn’t). Just because it was announced in Microsoft’s press conference doesn’t mean they own it exclusively. It just means that they wanted to draw attention to the fact that it will be on xbox 360.

Read full topic

item.title: Kojima Productions, NEXT
item.dc:creator: Winged_One
item.description:
Well, they do pay for a lot of stuff. Still, I gave up two summers literally working every day to get enough money to buy a PC. When they ended up buying it for me, I asked if I could use the money to buy a PS3. They didn’t quite like that question at all…

item.title: Kojima Productions, NEXT
item.dc:creator: Crunchy
item.description:
OldDirtyBastard:

Tell em to go fuck themselves. Your over 18, right?

oh, it’s another teaser.
it’s been for two days there already

Well I mean if they pay for your utilities, food, and other living expenses and you live in their house then I think they have a right to take an interest in how you spend your money (since you only have spare money because of them). If on the other hand you pay rent to your parents, then they should stfu.
